roleset.name: acquire characteristics through evolution, again

example.name: re-evolve-v
example.text: However , even if the direction of selection does reverse in this way , traits that were lost in the past may not re - evolve in an identical form -LRB- see Dollo 's law -RRB- .

propbank.arg: traits that were lost in the past

example.name: re-evolution-n
example.text: The second , more recent , occasion occurred after the re - evolution of a special leg lobe that disguises the body profile to help the insect hide from predators .

propbank.arg: of a special leg lobe that disguises the body profile to help the insect hide from predators

roleset.note: RE-EVOLVE-V, RE-EVOLUTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.
